io.spine.server.procman

Class ProcessManagerRepository<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,S,?>,S extends io.spine.base.EntityState<I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.Repository<I,E>
      • io.spine.server.entity.RecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
        • io.spine.server.entity.DefaultRecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
          • io.spine.server.entity.EventDispatchingRepository<I,P,S>
            • io.spine.server.procman.ProcessManagerRepository<I,P,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of IDs of process managers
    P - the type of process managers
    S - the type of process manager state messages
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging, MessageDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope>, MulticastDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope>, Closeable, EventProducingRepository, EventDispatcher, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class ProcessManagerRepository<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,S,?>,S extends io.spine.base.EntityState<I>>
extends EventDispatchingRepository<I,P,S>
implements EventProducingRepository
    The abstract base for Process Managers repositories.
    See Also:
    ProcessManager

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • registerWith

        @OverridingMethodsMustInvokeSuper
public void registerWith(BoundedContext context)
        Registers itself as an event dispatcher with the parent BoundedContext.

        Customizes event routing to use first message field.

        Registers with the CommandBus for dispatching commands (via delegating dispatcher).

        Registers with the IntegrationBroker for dispatching external events and rejections.

        Ensures there is at least one handler method declared by the class of the managed process manager:

        • command handler methods;
        • domestic or external event reactor methods;
        • domestic or external rejection reactor methods;
        • commanding method.

        Throws an IllegalStateException otherwise.

        Overrides:
        registerWith in class EventDispatchingRepository<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,S,?>,S extends io.spine.base.EntityState<I>>
        Parameters:
        context - the Bounded Context of this repository
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the Process Manager class of this repository does not declare message handling methods

      • setupCommandRouting

        protected void setupCommandRouting(CommandRouting<I> routing)
        A callback for derived classes to customize routing schema for commands.

        Default routing returns the value of the first field of a command message.

        Parameters:
        routing - the routing schema to customize

      • dispatchCommand

        public final void dispatchCommand(CommandEnvelope command)
        Dispatches the command to a corresponding process manager.

        If there is no stored process manager with such an ID, a new process manager is created and stored after it handles the passed command.

        Parameters:
        command - a request to dispatch

      • dispatchTo

        protected final void dispatchTo(I id,
                                io.spine.core.Event event)
        Dispatches the given event to an entity with the given ID.

        Sends the given event to the Inbox of this repository.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • configure

        protected void configure(P processManager)
        A callback method for configuring a recently created ProcessManager instance before it is returned by the repository as the result of creating a new process manager instance or finding existing one.

        Default implementation does nothing. Overriding repositories may use this method for injecting dependencies that process managers need to have.

        Parameters:
        processManager - the process manager to configure

      • findOrCreate

        protected final P findOrCreate(I id)
        Loads an entity by the passed ID or creates a new one, if the entity was not found.

        An entity will be loaded whether its active or not.

        The new entity is created if and only if there is no record with the corresponding ID.

        Overrides to expose the method to the package.

        Overrides:
        findOrCreate in class RecordBasedRepository<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,S,?>,S extends io.spine.base.EntityState<I>>
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the entity to load
        Returns:
        the entity with the specified ID

        Note: The storage must be assigned before calling this method.

      • close

        @OverridingMethodsMustInvokeSuper
public void close()
        Description copied from class: Repository
        Closes the repository by closing the underlying storage.

        The reference to the storage becomes null after this call.

        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Overrides:
